venue.name: Stonehurst the Robert Treat Paine Estate

item.description:
9.5 - 10 minute mile pace.

Meet at parking lot at Stonehurst/Paine Estate.

4 mile option:  run the greenway up to Trapelo road and return to Stonehurst on the same path.

7.5 mile option:  run the greenway to the Metropolitan Parkway North on the Lexington border, then R on the parkway, continue onto Forest, R on Beaver to return to Stonehurst.

IF YOU INDICATE IN YOUR RSVP BY SATURDAY MORNING THAT YOU ARE GOING THE LONGER ROUTE I WILL CACHE WATER FOR YOU ON THE ROUTE :-)

fun times
item.name: Western Greenway Run 4 or 7.5 miles
